issue.title: www.terabox.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.terabox.com/main?category=all](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.terabox.com%2Fmain%3Fcategory%3Dall) ### Comment > * Self-promo at the bottom left corner of the page > * A script prevents the Firefox Developer Tools from being used. It redirects to about:blank ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1vlh3myp17vo0sowg8g4s4scwcg800kdca4sphi8ag.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances
